name: shouldFailWhenAdminSecretAbsent()
description: Should fail when the admin secret specified is absent in the deployment namespace
descriptionHtml: Should fail when the admin secret specified is absent in the deployment namespace

testStage.description: Should fail when the admin secret specified is absent in the deployment namespace

steps.name: Given I have configured not configured a secret with admin credentials to a remote database service
When I request an DBMS Capability that is externally provided to a non-existing admin secret
Then an EntandoControllerException is thrown by the CapabilityProvider
Executing command PROVIDE_CAPABILITY

steps.name: And the resulting status objects of both the ProvidedCapability and EntandoDatabaseService reflect the failure and the cause for the failure
The phase of the statuses of both the ProvidedCapability and EntandoDatabaseService is FAILED
And the statuses of  both the ProvidedCapability and EntandoDatabaseService reflect the correct error message

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a controller developer, I would like request a capability that will allow me to use an external database service so that I can leverage existing database infrastructure
